short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add and remove tasks on google calendar via chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is chrome extension is made to make life easier by easily accessing google calendar. By allowing you to add and remove reminders via chrome extension, you can be efficient at planning what homework/tasks/projects are due. Add and remove tasks on Google Calendar via gTasker.
